text: The Addison Senate District is one of 13 Vermont Senate districts included in the redistricting and reapportionment plan developed by the Vermont General Assembly following the 2010 U.S. Census. The plan applies to legislatures elected in 2012, 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2020. A new plan will be developed in 2022 following the 2020 U.S. Census. The Addison district includes all of Addison County and Buel's Gore and the Town of Huntington from Chittenden County. As of the 2010 census, the state as a whole had a population of 625,741.
